definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: It is also a better Lewis base.
sentences.chinese: 氙也是较好的路易斯碱。

sentences.english: A panorama sunroof and bi-xenon headlights will follow at a later time.
sentences.chinese: 全景天窗和双氙大灯将在稍后的时间。

sentences.english: The result was the peculiar segregation of xenon isotopes we uncovered .
sentences.chinese: 结果就是我们所观察到，氙同位素的特殊区隔。

sentences.english: Another special feature is adaptive bi-xenon headlights.
sentences.chinese: 另一个特殊功能是自适应双氙大灯。

sentences.english: Xenon and krypton are not retained by the body so they have little effect.
sentences.chinese: 氙和氪不能在人体内停留所以对人体影响很小。

sentences.english: Because of its lower effective nuclear charge, xenon is more easily oxidized than krypton.
sentences.chinese: 因为氙的有效荷电荷较低，所以氙比氪容易被氧化。

sentences.english: Because of its lower effective nuclear charge, xenon is more easily oxidized than krypton.
sentences.chinese: 因为氙的有效荷电荷较低，所以氙比氪容易被氧化。

sentences.english: Accelerated electrons are scattered by xenon atoms in the xenon filled thyratron.
sentences.chinese: 加速电子与充氙闸流管中的氙原子碰撞，电子被散射。

sentences.english: Accelerated electrons are scattered by xenon atoms in the xenon filled thyratron.
sentences.chinese: 加速电子与充氙闸流管中的氙原子碰撞，电子被散射。

definition: tritium 3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3
deuterium 2H/heavy hydrogen, isotope of hydrogen having 1 neutron in its nucleus, so atomic weight 2
protium 1H/light hydrogen, the most common isotope of hydrogen, having no neutron, so atomic weight 1

pinyin: fang4 she4 xing4 tong2 wei4 su4
